text: Scruff may refer to: * Scruff (anatomy), a loose, non-sensitive area of skin by which a mother can carry her young * Scruff (app), a mobile application for gay men * Scruff (TV series), a children's animated television series * Scruff Connors (1952–2016), Canadian radio broadcaster * Mr. Scruff (born 1972), British DJ and artist ==See also== * Scruffy (disambiguation) * The Scruffs
title: Scruff
